entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HashSet<int>.CreateSetComparer implementation is not symmetric #69218
  • System.Text.Json using interpolated string with JsonSerializable.TypeInfoPropertyName fails with ArgumentException #69207
    7.0.0
  • There may be unexpectedly high delays in `ReaderWriterLockSlim` operations #69206
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] emscripten 3.1.9 ftruncate64 syscall regression #69205
    7.0.0
  • JIT perf: Span.Slice(0, ...) emits unnecessary 64-bit extensions #69200
  • The certificate that you're adding to HttpClientHandler.ClientCertificates only contains the public key. The SSL connection can't happen without access to the private key. #69199
  • superpmi-diffs and superpmi-replay are running when jiteeversionguid.h changes #69197
    7.0.0
  • Backport PR failures in github action #69196
    7.0.0
  • JIT does not hoist bound check outside a loop #69194
  • NullReferenceException inside ConcurrentDictionary.GrowTable #69192
  • TaskCanceledException in msbuild while building on OSX-x64 #69190
  • Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector4 on Arm64 #69186
    7.0.0
  • XxHash incremental versions not processing stripe when filling holdback exactly. #69184
  • HTTP/2: High P99 latency when sending a large request body #69179
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.Text` property #69168
  • Client Certificate Authentication Time out after 100s On Linux #69167
  • WASM AOT compilation runs indefinitely and consumes all system memory with LanguageExt.Core #69166
    7.0.0

Closed

  • `Func<T>.MakeGenericType(typeof(ReadOnlySpan<char>))` throws `ArgumentException` in 7.0.100-preview.4 while the exception was `TypeLoadException` in prior versions #69084
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(l2 < optLoopCount) || (l2 == BasicBlock::NOT_IN_LOOP)' during 'Do value numbering' #68769
    7.0.0
  • "Handle is already used by another Socket." causing 502 errors (NET Core 2.2., NET 5.0, Kestrel, CentOS, Nginx) #56750
    7.0.0
  • Test hang: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.CreateSocket.Ctor_SafeHandle_Listening_Success #56666
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'markedLastLoop && markedCurrLoop' during 'Generate code' #65988
    7.0.0
  • File.Copy on macOS wrong escape of characters #68960
  • Assertion failed 'alignInstr->idaIG->endsWithAlignInstr()' during 'Generate code' #65690
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'paddingToAdd == paddingNeeded' in 'System.SpanTests.IndexOfAnyExceptTests`1[Byte][System.Byte]:SomeElementsDontMatch_ReturnsOffset(int,System.Int32[]):this' #68510
    7.0.0
  • Return value marshalling should not require CustomTypeMarshallerDirection.In #69086
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient failed to handle Request Entity Too Large (413) response #69048
  • [mono] Tracking: Intrinsics runtime tests #43842
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Awaitable Interfaces (implementing `GetAwaiter()`) #69183
  • Browser AOT leg failing in compilation on Regex source generator tests #60048
    7.0.0
  • aspnet core Identity not working after deployment on server #69134
  • [Mono Android] Runtime tests used more memory than Android simulator allowed #44643
    7.0.0
  • "Fatal error. Internal CLR error." when running System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Tests in CI #69181
  • [QUIC] Adopt msquic generated interop layer #67377
    7.0.0
  • failfast in native code invoked by MsQuicStream.Dispose in CI #68954
  • Support blittable type marshalling without `DisableRuntimeMarshalling` #69033
    7.0.0
  • Build break on ijw host and generic maths interfaces #69174
  • Possible Assert when disposing SslStream during transfer/handshake #66818
    7.0.0
  • Current state of Blazor WebAssembly and the Firefox Debugger #52698
    Future
  • `LibraryImport` source generator test project fails to build in VS #69064
  • Add validation / emit errors when ref configurations contain RIDs #29154
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Breaks from nested loops #69175
  • Getting error on windows => System.PlatformNotSupportedException: 'System.IO.Ports is currently only supported on Windows.' #25375
    7.0.0
  • JIT: libraries PGO assert during Find Loops #69032
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Extract the main run loop from DevToolsClient, and #69219
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add comment about PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync(0) #69217
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Fix message about missing constructor for CallerAllocatedBuffer support #69216
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Pull out some common code snippets for custom struct marshalling tests #69215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Fix handling of custom type marshaller pinning with a different type than the native type. #69214
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add `BStrStringMarshaller` to source generator #69213
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Update to a newer Roslyn compiler #69211
  • Clear `NO_CSE` on struct addresses in `MorphCommaBlock` #69210
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Treat `INDEX_ADDR`s as non-null #69209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • fix invalid Host header for link-local IPv6 #69203
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Arm64: Make unroll code for cpblk non-interruptible #69202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: Capture test output with xunit, so the output is cleaner, and the #69201
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Add missing (uint) cast in regex generated code #69198
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Renamed most of the Redhawk occurences to NativeAOT #69195
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Optimize Span.Slice by using IsKnownConstant for start = 0 #69193
    area-System.Runtime, optimization
  • [wasm-mt] Fix references in `System.Threading.ThreadPool.WebAssembly.Threading` #69191
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update gcc leg to 12.1.0 #69188
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix HTTP3 stress #69182
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Switch checked coreclr + libraries tests configs around in PRs #69180
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stop running both normal and no_tiered_compilation scenarios for coreclr PRs #69178
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix issue in verify regions #69177
    area-GC-coreclr
  • I noticed some initalizations were missing… #69176
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable k-nucleotide-9 in llvmfullaot #69173
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • make sure NetworkInfo works without IPv6 on Linux #69172
    area-System.Net, os-linux
  • ARM64 - Add GT_CHK_DIV_BY_ZERO #69170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Normalize Nil PublicKeyToken to an empty array #69169
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

Merged

  • Enable UMOD optimization for x64 #68091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reset the bbNatLoopNum of block for removed loop #68804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold range checks with constant operands #69056
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update perf map docs #68181
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Loop alignment: Fix loop size calculation to exclude IG's size that are marked as not aligned #68869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix error on return value marshalling without CustomTypeMarshallerDirection.In #69189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add Arm64 PGO Builds #66867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adjust the usage of ReverseEndianness in BinaryPrimitives #69063
    area-System.Buffers, optimization, community-contribution
  • Removing comments so won't overwrite doc changes #69089
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • StringMarshaller optimizations #69035
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • "[QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop (#68288)" attempt no 2 #69009
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Support strictly blittable type marshalling #69100
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Don't return SslStreamBuffer when disposing during handshake #68956
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Copy propagate on `LCL_FLD`s #68592
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Error if a reference assembly is platform specific #69116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Call simpler overloads of Substring and Slice #68937
    area-Meta
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #69152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: fix issue with assert seen in OSR+PGO tests #69067
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating BigInteger to implement IBinaryInteger and ISignedNumber #68964
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Treat System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe as intrinsic #68739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support Requires on type in NativeAot #68978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Various refactorings to share more code with future generators #67997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Workaround crash in Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native #68990
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • ARM64 - Do not emit possible DIV_BY_ZERO/OVERFLOW exception blocks for non-zero/non-(negative one) constants #68945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Consolidate 'msub' and 'madd' logic #68363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not discard byref zeros in `native int + byref` additions #68086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly support to System.Text.Json #69160
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix missing metadata for ThreadPool Event #68876
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve some use of Regex #68961
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add windows runtime packs as a workload #68981
    area-Build-mono
  • Define convention to consume and/or package analyzers #69069
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • allow null TargetHost in SslClientAuthenticationOptions #69071
    area-System.Net.Security
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Address some System.Formats.Tar TODOs (infra and syscalls) #69107
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix linker tests not running and show full path during trimming test execution #69118
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • PoC: retire internal SocketExceptionFactory #68918
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm-ep] Minimal diagnostic tracing configuration and sample #69158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Substitute GT_RET_EXPR in inline candidate arguments #69117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix scalability issue in redundant branch optimizer #68972
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Simplify `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #68853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix `impBoxPatternMatch` #68382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Unify SendContent cancellation between HTTP3 and HTTP2 #67954
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing wrong stack size calculation in the mono interpreter for back edges #68855
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.9 #68765
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Deadlock mitigation for debugging #69121
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: Use csel for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove "promoted parameter" tailcall limitation #69034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Docker fixes for the enterprise linux testing pipeline #68913
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Implement constant-folding for `VNF_BitCast` #68979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.StringAssert("{","x") throws System.FormatException #25373
  • Single EXE build takes minutes to launch, self contained build launches in seconds #25371
  • Implement the MSBuild Server Client Library as the default build driver #25365
    7.0.1xx
  • NET1136 errors in net6.0 project after updating to 6.0.300. #25363
  • Running dotnet/performance benchmark script with arm architecture fails for preview4. #25362
  • NetCore why not use bin or lib directory DLL files by default #25351
  • An instance of analyzer Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MakeFieldReadonly.MakeFieldReadonlyDiagnosticAnalyzer cannot be created starting version 6.0.300 #25345

Closed

  • SDK should add NETStandard.Library v2.x reference instead of the NETStandard.Library v1.6.1 #24799
  • AnsiConsole should support NO_COLOR #25264
    7.0.1xx
  • Workload pack version is truncated if target platform major or minor version end in 0 #25370
  • Warning NETSDK1179 is always raised #25366

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25374
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Replace hardcoded error string in source with string from resources #25372
    localization, area-Meta
  • Always detect if SelfContained was specified by the user #25367
    Servicing-consider, Area-NetSDK
  • Support suppressing transitive framework reference downloads, and other changes #25358
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.1 to the current framework #25350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1765805 #25346
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Use System.Environment to obtain user HOME dir #25117
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for opting out of ANSI coloring via NO_COLOR env. variable #25273
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25340
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #25329
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #25330
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Marcpop msft upgraderuntime605 #25333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #25336
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Servicing F# #25325
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Add a helper script for identifying the SDK release containing a SHA #25337
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan initialization from static data #5295
  • Discussion: Permit static lambda assignment to function pointers #3476
  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Spec out numeric IntPtr #6031

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide alignment guarantees for embedded binary data #61259
  • ValueTuple reference location does not work for .NET 6.0 completion test #61258
  • 'Convert to interpolated string' produces nonsense when involving raw string literal #61256
  • Static virtual members of interfaces are not included into completion list on a type parameter #61255
  • Compiler needs to declaratively fail when loading newer analyzers #61252
    17.3
  • Compiler should treat `and`/`or` as keywords when matching enum in incomplete trees #61246
  • Compiler produces weird error in bad pattern matching #61245
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens flickering #61239
  • Compiler should warn on `foreach (ref T2 t2 in enumThatIsRefT1)` #61238
  • [LSP] Simplify semantic tokens token types legend #61237
  • Remove `AssemblySymbol.RuntimeSupportsNumericIntPtr` once we add `TargetFramework.Net70` #61235
    C# 11.0

Closed

  • ValueTrackingTree visual leaks WPF animation #61186
    17.3
  • .editorconfig dotnet_naming_symbols.constant_fields affects non-constant symbols #61249
    17.3
  • Better conversion target rules should be updated for nint/nuint #61199
    17.3
  • Microsoft.NetCore.Compilers packages do not support Arm64 runtimes #29126
  • Revert FixAll support for Invert conditional refactoring #60956
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Move off of IOperation in speculation analyzer. #61257
    Area-IDE
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE
  • Update FindRefs API to support searching for multiple symbols at the same time. #61248
    Area-IDE
  • Fix several LSP completion kind mappings #61243
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add FixAll support for UseExpressionBody/BlockBody refactoring #61240
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Recommend 'static' and 'virtual' after each other in an interface. #61253
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Fix WPF issue with indeterminate progress bar #61254
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Add support for re-abstraction of operators in derived interfaces. #61244
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Simplify RegexCharClass.IsWordChar #61242
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState" #61216
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Work around project system bug #61247
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Avoid yield in ReadAsync/WriteAsync unless on main thread #61187
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add FixAll support for "Convert to raw string" refactoring #61105
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61236
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61260
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • More SyntaxContext sharing among CompletionProviders #61221
    Area-IDE
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove document options provider #61228
    Area-IDE
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle some possible null-references #61132
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll in Project and Solution support for AddFileBanner refactoring #61208
    Area-Analyzers
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Fix nested in generic type binding issues in enabled nullability context #61182
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE
  • Add pointer for `AnalysisLevel` to warning waves doc #61196
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Fix for Issue #55606: [EE] Format IAsyncEnumerable method names correctly. #61211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams
  • Improve SyntaxNormalizer performance #50778
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Add JSON semantic token classifications #61231
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch does not apply changes in razor page #41645
  • WebAPI template Swagger API versioning support #41643
  • Error with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation after updating to 6.0.4/6.0.5 #41642
  • Cleanup ide.host.json files. #41638
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Consider setting PersistenceScope for other template options #41637
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Results.ValidationProblem not including errors in response #41634
  • run restore.cmd failed #41633
  • Razor runtime compilation fails for duplicate types using extern aliases. #41632
  • Visual Studio does not retain 'Do not use top-level statements' check. #41631
    7.0-preview5
  • Quarantine GetWithRouteParameter_WriteMultiple_CancellationBefore_CallCanceled #41629
  • OpenAPI Client Generator, Generating multiple clients named same thing. #41627
  • CSS Isolation & RCL Support does not generate the correct CSS import for WASM Apps not hosted at root #41625
  • Unintuitive/incorrect behaviour from use of WithOpenApi() #41623
  • OpenApiGenerator throws ArgumentException if duplicate response model present for a status code #41622
  • [Blazor] Replacing EditForm Model causes component destruction #41621

Closed

  • Make shadow copy a non-experimental feature #40961
    7.0-preview5
  • Add CancellationToken overloads for reading multipart form sections #41532
    7.0-preview5
  • Can't update to packages to 6.0.5, issues with System.IO.Pipelines supporting >= 6.0.3 #41606
  • 'Do not use top level statements' check does not work for Minimal API template. #41636
  • Use interned strings in Hub protocol implementations #41342
    .NET 7 Planning
  • The type or namespace 'Internal' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.AspnetCore.Http'. Are you missing an assembly reference? #41522
  • Using Kestrel server with SignalR client causes hanging requests #41575

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix partial chunked cookies #41646
  • Avoid repeatedly encoding method name strings in protocol #41644
  • [release/6.0] Update SPA templates submodule #41641
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.6
  • Make Mvc Individual auth test fail when useLocalDb is true #41640
    area-mvc
  • Adding API convention to contribute to Endpoint Metadata #41635
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Quarantine GetWithRouteParameter_WriteMultiple_CancellationBefore_CallCanceled #41630
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview5
  • Add CancellationToken overloads for reading multipart form sections #41533
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Updating branding & merge internal commits #41617
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • Don't allocate method name strings in protocol #41465
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview5
  • Count forms with invalid content-disposition in FormFeature #41616
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime
  • Surrogate argument list in Minimal APIs #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • HELIX failures investigations #41563
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #41613
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.26
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #41612

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nullable attributes are missing #7050
  • FontImageSource in iOS does not honor padding in buttons #7047
  • Accessing a contact stored on the device always returns null #7046
  • [Android] Shell BackButtonBehavior binding Command to valid ICommand causes back button to disappear #7045
  • upgrade from dotnet 6 to 7 errors #7040
  • Using SkiaSharp with Maui crashes the app on Android in Release #7037
  • Background color cannot be changed on page #7036
  • CollectionView on Android, SelectionChangedCommand does not get called #7035
  • [Feature Request] Windows Toolbar items Remove the 3 dots to access the toolbar item #7034
  • Shell: Tabs are not displayed correctly in RC 3 (transparent controls, inconsistent behavior) #7033
  • I installed the MAUI workload, but I don't see New Maui project option in VS17.3.0 #7041
  • ListView Context Actions with non-intuitive accessibility on Android #7028
  • [Android] NavigationPage throws InvalidProgramException in Release #7027
    6.0.300
  • How to remove bounce effect in ScrollView #7026
  • Animated gifs are not working properly #7021
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Animated gifs never stop #7020
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Animated gifs do not start initially #7019
    6.0.300-servicing
  • AbsoluteLayout miss align on MacOS and iOS #7018
  • Android app icon not displaying #7017
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] No Background is rendered on Borders with Shadows #7015
  • Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange in the lifecycle events and/or MauiUIApplicationDelegate #7012
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Height of the view inside the CollectionView and extra padding inside the Grid. #7011

Closed

  • Shell on Android: Icons not Shown (RC1) #6361
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] Crash with FlexLayout inside ScrollView #4081
    6.0.300
  • MAUI Blazor installer hangs #5857
    6.0.300
  • .NET MAUI ignores all platforms except Windows #5679
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] [MacCatalyst]: Layout is not invalidated when Visibility is changed for controls using ViewRenderer as Handler #4849
    6.0.300
  • Blazor-MAUI Nav-Menu funky visuals on resize #6942

  • MAUI Blazor is loading forever on Android 6 #6640
    .NET 7
  • Warn if project contains .razor files but doesn't reference Razor SDK #4536
    .NET 7
  • Inconsistent RoundRectangle CornerRadius Border.ClipShape between Android and iOS #6981
    6.0.300
  • Border rendered incorrectly and shadow not working on Android #5820
    6.0.300-servicing
  • ANDROID: Problem with on release apk not working. #6578
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Failed to launch the iOS remote Simulator #7029
  • ActionSheets do not work in MAUI Windows #7004
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Windows DisplayActionSheet vertical layout is set to fill instead of center #6508
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Gif image not working in MAUI #5034
    6.0.300
  • Image cannot display device picture. #6918
    6.0.300
  • MenuBarItems Command is not executed. (Verified on Windows) #7024
  • "requestLayout() improperly called" warnings spamming output #6755
    6.0.300
  • Frames cause debug output spam and degrade performance on Android #6606
    6.0.300-servicing
  • CarouselView with direct ContentView items in XAML shows error #7000
  • MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync() is not supported on ios ? #7013
  • ImageButton Image not scaling down by Width- and HeightRequest #4913
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Maui project pre-compiler errors using partial classes with multi-targetting #7005

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: Flatten out TPC union tables in join #28009
  • State of join entity entry is "Added" although entity is tracked by setting State="Modified". #28005
  • Add-migrations fails when order of Migrations isn't correct #28004
  • Read-only transaction support #28003
  • GroupBy with SelectMany and Take() - The LINQ expression could not be translated #28002
  • can provide a method for obtaining query parameters? #28001
  • How can I see what issues are fixed in a release? #28000

Closed

  • query/TPC : consider pruning unused columns from the TPC Union entity structure #27967
    7.0.0
  • TPC: Remove unnecessary union tables #27957
    7.0.0
  • TPC: Allow DbSet for abstract types #27947
    7.0.0
  • TPC: Bug while seeding #27945
    7.0.0
  • ToTable(b => {}) should map the entity type to the default table #27608
    7.0.0
  • Relational: TPC inheritance mapping pattern #3170
    7.0.0
  • RelationalMethodCallTranslatorProvider and explicit typeMapping #27524
    7.0.0
  • Function StoreType is ignored for DateTime #27954
    7.0.0
  • Diagnostics: DataReaderDisposingEventData.ReadCount accumulates the value from different readers #27652
    6.0.6
  • SQLite doesn't work when trimming #27311
    6.0.6
  • Missing link efcore-manage-schemas #27290
    7.0.0
  • IMethodCallTranslatorPlugin is Scoped in ServiceCharacteristics but Singleton in document #26667
    7.0.0
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - extra migrations generated when no change #27911
  • How to load vfs extensions in Microsoft.Data.Sqlite? #27986
  • Improve SQL Server query performance by always specifying the schema in table names #27922
  • Using EXECUTE AS USER puts session in kill state #27999

PullRequests

Merged

  • Query: TPC prune unused concrete tables and columns #27993
  • Throw if an entity type in table-sharing uses TPC #27988
  • Query: Infer type mapping from IDbFunction while translating #27995
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27944
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #28007
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #28008
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Bump .NET SDK to 7.0.100-preview.4 #27994
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #27997
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #27998

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Tools: Target .NET 6 to improve compatibility with osx-arm64 #27807
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Capitalize database name #27966
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
